channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street light out. Very dark along the footpath. Already have a problem with antisocial behaviour. This will not help, 8th August
item.description:
Outside number 16 Buckles Close. Needs sorting ASAP
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Buckles Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drains, 8th August
item.description:
The lovely new perforated kerbs are blocked with silt and weeds growing in them. These and all roads on the area have not had their gutters and drains cleaned for three years or more. Don’t we clean roads anymore? The accumulation of dead leaves and road detritus is a disgrace. The slightest amount of rain makes the roads awash. Danger to motorists in general and motorcycles in particular.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Marking on :Pavement?, 8th August
item.description:
The Pavement on the Allotment side of Alma Rd Blue markings have been added in the last couple of days. there are two boxes marked 'EVCP' Does anyone know why these have been done?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Alma Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Blocked & Foul Smelling Kerb Gulley, 8th August
item.description:
The kerb gully outside No27 stinks all year round. Some days worse than others but stinks 90% of the time. The smell is sewer smell and affects the immediate vicinity. We asked Severn Trent to take a look and they confirmed it is Highways responsibility and suggested that it is silted up or broken. It should not smell of sewer. I raised this issue to highways 2 weeks ago and it was closed with no action by Highways and no communication. The gully has not been maintained in the 23 years that we have lived here. We would really appreciate some help to resolve this.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Moorend Crescent, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown tree blocking pavement, 8th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Fairfield Park Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham

item.title: Road closed off with no signage, 8th August
item.description:
Westfield road area. This morning the traffic lights were stuck on red. Now the road ia closed off with no signage anywhere to state this. Cars from all directions are having to randomly turn round to go other ways. They have completely closed the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Westfield Road, Brockworth, Gloucester

item.title: Missing iron water cover - VERY DANGEROUS, 8th August
item.description:
In front of No 32 on Prestbury Road, next to the bus stop, the iron cover is missing for a manhole (to water I think but without the cover - who knows). It has been missing for months. It has been reported before. All that was done after reporting, was that a cone was placed on top (nothing was fixed). The cone is now gone. The manhole is open again. It is very very dangerous. The paint surrounding the hole was put there ages ago by me, not someone who was supposed to fix it. The is extremely dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 8th August
item.description:
